Looking to Join the Heroes of Combat? 

Battlefield 2,  BF 2142, Bad Company 2, The Call of Duty Series, And Many Others! 
Website: www.hoc-clan.com 
You must be at least 18; we only recruit adults 

Heroes of Combat is a mature FPS clan in the gaming community. 
Our members believe: "Mature gamers = better teamwork." 
All [hoc] members are adults; several are active duty or ex-military. 

We believe real-life issues come first; [hoc] server donations are NOT mandatory. 
We are both casual and competitive; we've been ranked TWL for over 5 years. 
We have a Vent channel and website; we also make hilarious vids and podcasts. 

When visiting our Website you will notice in the -Recruitment- section there will be a ReadME that explains our Recruitment Process. Please Read this before posting your application. If you have any questions feel free to post on our forums or in this thread. 

If you are hesitant about the joining process, dont be turned away by it. Its just a formality so we can get to know you and make sure youll fit in and have fun with us. Add our members in game or jump in our servers if you want to play with us before you post up your application.
If you're interested in joining a specialized and mature FPS clan, 
[hoc] Heroes of Combat welcomes you.
